DOC.brief_title: A Relative Bioavailability Study Acetaminophen 650 mg Extended Release Gelcaps Under Fasting Condition
DOC.detailed_description: Following overnight fast least 10 hour , subject administer single oral dose acetaminophen 650 mg extend release tablet administer 240 mL drinking water period study supervision train study personnel . Both test ( T ) reference ( R ) product administer study subject , one period ( except subject 40 ) . During course study , safety parameter assess vital sign , clinical examination , medical history clinical laboratory safety test ( hematology , biochemical , serology parameter , urine analysis urine drug screen ) measure base line . Laboratory parameter haematology biochemistry ( except glucose cholesterol ) repeat end study .
